                        throws CatalogTransformerException

        Transforms the provided Metacard into a BinaryContent
        Specified by:
        transform in interface MetacardTransformer
        Parameters:
        metacard - the Metacard to be transformed
        arguments - any arguments to be used in the transformation. Keys are specific to each MetacardTransformer implementation
        Returns:
        BinaryContent the result of the Metacard transformation
        Throws:
        CatalogTransformerException - if the Metacard can not be transformed
